column2: '''Editing style<ref name="editStyle" group=Note>"Source" means you see and edit the TeX source files. "[[WYSIWYM]]" = What You See Is What You Mean
column3: i.e. you see and edit formatted text. [[WYSIWYG]] means that see the output file automatically updated during the edit. Note that some PDF viewers (e.g. evince) automatically reload the PDF document when it is updated on the disk. So
column4: any "source" TeX editor can be turned into partial WYSIWYG editor by opening such a reader in an adjacent window.</ref>'''
